Summary: Star shape to the naked eye, saw star go into star, on camrecorder, object changed 4 different colors, moved in & out changing cycles.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Topton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWife &i sitting inside watching tv,I saw blue flash outside.See looked up and pointed out bright star.I got JVC camrecorder i recorded for about an hour trying to keep object in the center of camera,also trying different magnifications. I was just trying to figure out what it was.It went away in about an hour. I have it still on the recorder.
